snx-price.title: OKS PRICE
snx-price.infoData: The price of OKS is obtained from Chainlink oracles, which are retrieved using the <sjslink>{{sjsLinkText}}</sjslink>. <newParagraph>For the chart, the data is collected from the "DailyOKSPrice" and "FifteenMinuteOKSPrice" entities in the Oikos rates subgraph <viewPlaygroundLink>{{viewPlaygroundLinkText}}</viewPlaygroundLink>.</newParagraph>

snx-market-cap.title: OKS MARKET CAP
snx-market-cap.subtext: Fully diluted market cap for OKS
snx-market-cap.infoData: The market cap is calculated using the price of OKS from Chainlink oracles multiplied against the total supply of OKS tokens (fully diluted including escrow). These data points are retrieved using the <linkText>{{sjsLinkText}}</linkText>.

susd-price.title: sUSD PRICE
susd-price.subtext: Price of sUSD on Oikos Swap V2
susd-price.infoData: The price of sUSD is calculated using the peg from Oikos Swap V2, which holds the majority of sUSD in a USDT based liquidity pool. The peg is calculated using the ratio between the reserves of each token in the pool.

total-snx-locked.title: TOTAL OKS STAKED
total-snx-locked.subtext: The total value of all staked OKS
total-snx-locked.infoData: To calculate the value of OKS tokens staked we sample the top 1,000 OKS stakers using the <sDataLink>{{sDataLinkText}}</sDataLink> and then determine what proportion of OKS they have staked.<newParagraph>We then multiply this proportion across the total supply of OKS tokens which we get from the <sjsLink>{{sjsLinkText}}</sjsLink>.</newParagraph><newParagraph>Taking a small sample produces a result that is very close to taking the entire set of holders and allows the page to load faster.</newParagraph>

network-cratio.title: NETWORK C-RATIO
network-cratio.subtext: The aggregate collateralization ratio of all OKS wallets
network-cratio.infoData: To calculate the network C-Ratio we use the following formula "Total OKS Supply * OKSPrice / Total Issued Synths." We get this data from the <sjsLink>{{sjsLinkText}}</sjsLink>.

active-cratio.title: ACTIVE C-RATIO
active-cratio.subtext: The aggregate collateralization ratio of OKS wallets that are currently staking
active-cratio.infoData: To calculate the C-Ratio of active stakers we sample the top 1,000 OKS stakers using the <sjsLink>{{sDataLinkText}}</sjsLink> and then determine the cumulative C-Ratio using their collateral-to-debt ratio.<newParagraph>Taking a small sample produces a result that is very close to taking the entire set of holders and allows the page to load faster.</newParagraph>

snx-holders.title: OKS HOLDERS
snx-holders.infoData: The number of OKS holders is obtained from the <linkText>{{subgraphLinkText}}</linkText>.

eth-collateral.title: ETH COLLATERAL
eth-collateral.subtext: Total number of Ether locked as collateral

susd-minted-from-eth.title: sUSD MINTED FROM ETH
susd-minted-from-eth.subtext: Total number of sUSD minted using Ether as collateral

largest-active-binary-market.title: LARGEST ACTIVE BINARY MARKET (USD)
largest-active-binary-market.subtext: The largest active binary options market is {{synth}} > {{price}} expiring at {{-date}}
largest-active-binary-market.infoData: To get the largest active binary options market, we pull all the "Market" entities from the <linkText>Synthetix options subgraph,</linkText> filter out any markets past their "expiryDate" and then sort them by "poolSize" to get the largest.

largest-binary-market-to-date.title: LARGEST BINARY MARKET TO DATE (USD)
largest-binary-market-to-date.subtext: The current number of active binary options markets
largest-binary-market-to-date.infoData: To get the largest binary options market to date, we pull all the "Market" entities from the <linkText>Synthetix options subgraph</linkText> and sort them by "poolSize" to get the largest.

number-of-active-binary-options-markets.title: NUMBER OF ACTIVE BINARY OPTIONS MARKETS
number-of-active-binary-options-markets.subtext: The current number of active binary options markets
number-of-active-binary-options-markets.infoData: To get the number of active binary options market, we pull all the "Market" entities from the <linkText>Synthetix options subgraph,</linkText>  filter out any markets past their "expiryDate" and then count the number of markets remaining.

total-pooled-in-binary-options.title: TOTAL POOLED IN BINARY OPTIONS (USD)
total-pooled-in-binary-options.subtext: The total amount of capital pooled in active binary options markets
total-pooled-in-binary-options.infoData: To get the total amount pooled in active binary options market, we pull all the "Market" entities from the <linkText>Synthetix options subgraph,</linkText> filter out any markets past their "expiryDate" and then sum the "poolSize" of the remaining active markets.

trades-in-binary-options-24-hrs.title: TRADES OVER 24 HOURS IN BINARY OPTIONS
trades-in-binary-options-24-hrs.subtext: The total number of trades over the past 24 hours in binary options markets
trades-in-binary-options-24-hrs.infoData: To get the total number of trades over the past 24 hours in binary options markets, we pull all the "OptionTransaction" entities from the <linkText>Synthetix options subgraph</linkText> within the past 24 hours and then count all the items.

options-pie-chart.title: BINARY MARKETS DOMINANCE
options-pie-chart.subtext: Distribution of Synths within the Synthetix protocol

current-staking-apy.title: CURRENT OKS STAKING APY
current-staking-apy.subtext: Current annual percentage yield from staking OKS
current-staking-apy.infoData: To calculate the total APY for staking OKS, we combine the OKS rewards APY and sUSD rewards APY given in the previous fee period.

current-staking-apy-susd.title: CURRENT OKS STAKING APY (sUSD REWARDS)
current-staking-apy-susd.subtext: Current annual sUSD yield for OKS stakers from Synth trading fees

current-staking-apy-snx.title: CURRENT OKS STAKING APY (OKS REWARDS)
current-staking-apy-snx.subtext: Current annual OKS yield for OKS stakers. This OKS comes from the inflationary OKS supply

current-fee-pool.title: CURRENT FEE POOL (sUSD)
current-fee-pool.subtext: The total value of all Synth trading fees both claimed and claimable in the weekly period which started on {{startDate}}
current-fee-pool.infoData: OKS and sUSD rewards are paid weekly to stakers who maintain their collateral ratio of OKS/debt. <newParagraph>Each week, stakers can claim Synth trading fees generated from the prior week.</newParagraph>

current-fee-pool-snx.title: CURRENT REWARDS POOL (OKS)
current-fee-pool-snx.subtext: The total value of all OKS staking rewards both claimed and claimable in the weekly period which started on {{startDate}}

unclaimed-fees-and-rewards.title: FEES IN NEXT PERIOD (USD)
unclaimed-fees-and-rewards.subtext: The total value of all unclaimed Synth trading fees and OKS staking rewards to be added in the following weekly period which started on {{startDate}}

fees-in-next-period.title: UNCLAIMED FEES AND REWARDS (USD)
fees-in-next-period.subtext: The total value of Synth trading fees already accumulated in this fee period that are claimable in the next fee period

total-active-stakers.title: TOTAL ACTIVE STAKERS
total-active-stakers.infoData: The number of total active stakers is obtained from the "TotalActiveStaker" entity from the <linkText>Synthetix subgraph.</linkText> The chart data shows the "TotalDailyActiveStaker" entity over time.

total-synths.title: TOTAL SYNTHS
total-synths.subtext: The total value of all Synths in USD

synth-bar-chart.title: TOTAL SYNTHS
synth-bar-chart.subtext: The total value of all Synths in USD

synth-pie-chart.title: SYNTH DOMINANCE
synth-pie-chart.subtext: Distribution of Synths within the Synthetix protocol

total-trading-volume.title: TOTAL TRADING VOLUME
total-trading-volume.subtext: Historical trading volume for all Synths
total-trading-volume.infoData: The total trading volume only shows data from after the Archernar release on <linkText>block 9,518,914 (Feb 20, 2020).</linkText> Prior to this release significant volume was generated via <linkText2>front running</linkText2> attempts.

total-trading-fees.title: TOTAL TRADING FEES
total-trading-fees.subtext: Historical trading fees for all Synths
total-trading-fees.infoData: The total trading fees only shows data from after the Archernar release on <linkText>block 9,518,914 (Feb 20, 2020).</linkText> Prior to this release significant volume was generated via <linkText2>front running</linkText2> attempts.

total-number-of-trades.title: TOTAL NUMBER OF TRADES
total-number-of-trades.subtext: Total historical trades for all Synths
total-number-of-trades.infoData: The total number of trades only shows data from after the Archernar release on <linkText>block 9,518,914 (Feb 20, 2020).</linkText> Prior to this release significant volume was generated via <linkText2>front running</linkText2> attempts.

24hr-exchange-volume.title: 24HR EXCHANGE VOLUME
24hr-exchange-volume.subtext: Total Synth trading volume over the past 24 hours

trading-volume.title: TRADING VOLUME
trading-volume.infoData: Each day we capture trading volume in the Synthetix protocol via the <linkText>Synthetix exchanges subgraph</linkText> using the "DailyTotal" entity. <newParagraph>The annual chart includes data from before the Archernar release on <linkText2 href={etherscanArchernarBlock}>block 9,518,914 (Feb 20, 2020).</linkText2> Prior to this release significant volume was generated via <linkText3 href={frontRunningWiki}>front running</linkText3> attempts.</newParagraph>

total-number-unique-traders.title: TOTAL NUMBER OF UNIQUE TRADERS
total-number-unique-traders.subtext: Ethereum addresses that have traded Synths

average-daily-traders.title: AVERAGE DAILY TRADERS
average-daily-traders.subtext: Average daily traders over the past 30 days

number-of-trades.title: NUMBER OF TRADES
number-of-trades.infoData: The number of trades is the sum of all daily periods in each chart below. The weekly chart (default) has 7 unique periods, monthly has 30 and annual has 365. <newParagraph>The number of trades is captured daily in the synthetix exchanges subgraph using the "DailyTotal" entity <linkText href={synthetixExchangesSubgraph}>(view playground).</linkText></newParagraph><fullLineLink>See GitHub repo for this subgraph</fullLineLink>

yield-farming-subtitle-text.sUSD: Rewards for providing liquidity to the {{name}} stablecoin liquidity pool on Curve
yield-farming-subtitle-text.default: Rewards for holding {{name}} and staking it in the rewards contract

lending-apy.title: LENDING APY
lending-apy.subtext: The current APY for lending OKS on AAVE

curve-susd.title: Curvepool sUSD
curve-susd.infoData: The APY for the sUSD Curve Pool consists of 3 different rewards:<fullLineText>1. Swap fees at {{swapFees}}</fullLineText><fullLineText>2. OKS rewards at {{snxRewards}}</fullLineText><fullLineText>3. CRV rewards {{rewards}}</fullLineText>
